rdf:Description.dc:title: Seasonal patterns of forage selection by wapiti (Cervus elaphus) in relation to land reclamation 1989
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Fargey, Patrick J.
Hawley, Alex W. L. (Alex Wilson Lewis), 1949-
Alberta Environmental Centre.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Masters thesis. A quantitative study of the preferences of wapiti for plant species used in land reclamation using captive wapiti to measure selection of 14 grasses and 4 legumes during winter, spring and summer seasons. Study site was located in a meadow belonging to Athabasca Ranch, near Hinton, Alberta.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Elk
Elk
Forage plants
Reclamation of land.
